org.jcvlib.core

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.core.Histogram

  • public class Histogram
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for manipulate image histograms.

    Links:
    1. Image histogram -- Wikipedia.

    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Field Detail

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CORREL

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CORREL
        Correlation comparison.

        Return values in interval [-1.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 1.0
        • Half match -- 0.0
        • Total mismatch -- -1.0

        Links:
        1. Correlation and dependence -- Wikipedia .

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CHISQR

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CHISQR
        Chi-Square comparison.

        Return values in interval [0.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 0.0
        • Half match -- 0.25
        • Total mismatch -- 1.0

        Links:
        1. Pearson's chi-squared test -- Wikipedia .

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_INTERSECT

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_INTERSECT
        Intersection comparison.

        Return values in interval [0.0, 1.0].

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 1.0
        • Half match -- 0.5
        • Total mismatch -- 0.0

         d(H1, H2) = Sumi( Min(H1(i), H2(i)) )

        Links:
        1. Intersection (set theory) -- Wikipedia.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_BHATTACHARYYA

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_BHATTACHARYYA
        Bhattacharyya comparison.

        Return values in interval [0.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 0.0
        • Half match -- 0.55
        • Total mismatch -- 1.0

        Links:
        1. Bhattacharyya distance -- Wikipedia.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public Histogram(Image image,
         int size)
        Create image histogram.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        size - Size of histogram per channel.

      • Histogram

        public Histogram(Image image)
        Create image histogram. Use 256 elements per channel by default.

      • resize

        public Histogram resize(int newSize)

      • compare

        public double compare(Histogram hist,
             int compareType)
        Compare current histogram.

        Histograms must have the same size!

        Parameters:
        hist - Second histogram to compare.
        compareType - Type of compare histograms. Use Hist.HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_*.

      • threshold

        public void threshold(double threshold)
        Threshold to zero. 
         if hist(i) <= threshold
      hist(i) := 0
 else
      // Do nothing.
